speaker: Graveyard
line: Headstones tilt like tired teeth. Wind combs through dry grass with the patience of a confession.

speaker: Gravekeeper Oren
line: No loud promises here. The dead take them personally.

speaker: Grinning Shade
line: Return the locket… or join the broken dead.

choices.text: Hold up the locket and speak a name.
Refuse. The living keep what they carry.

speaker: Gravekeeper Oren
line: If you can’t put a spirit to rest, at least don’t feed it. Don’t bargain. Don’t boast. And don’t answer when it calls you ‘friend’.

speaker: Graveyard
line: The air loosens. The shade’s grin fades to something almost human—then the wind scatters it like ash.
